title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing the body in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of someone who sees that part of his body has been disfigured? It indicates disagreements between the dreamer and one of his relatives. The meaning of seeing a place of body hair? Signs of trouble. What is the interpretation of seeing a burning body? Evidence of a person’s suffering. The interpretation of seeing fine body hair in one dream? Money elements And a period full of prosperity. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself braiding body hair? It indicates goodness and ample living. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s body. If one sees in a dream that part of his body has been mutilated, this indicates that there are differences between the dreamer and his relative, especially if the dreamer does not feel pain. During mutilation in a dream. Losing a limb in a dream means losing money or failure in some romantic relationship. Then if one dreams in a dream that he restores his mutilated body parts, this indicates a connection to the uterus. Seeing body hair on the seat is a sign of a problem. Seeing A dream about a man’s body: If one sees in a dream someone cutting off part of his body, this means that he will suffer injustice from some people, especially in the event that he feels pain during the mutilation. Cutting the body can mean great injustice and envy on the part of many people. Seeing the body burning is evidence A misfortune befalls a person. Then seeing boiling water falling on the body is evidence of the path of sin and the forbidden path. Seeing a burning body in a dream for a man is an unpleasant vision. Seeing a body in a dream could be a woman or money for a man. Interpretation of a dream about a single woman’s body if a girl sees That her body is emaciated in a dream, this is a sign of financial loss. Then seeing a woman’s body is evidence of the expenses incurred by the woman. Seeing soft body hair in one’s dream is a sign of money and a period of prosperity. Braiding body hair shows the endless goodness and nourishment that comes to this girl. Seeing Dreaming of the body of Nabul: The body of a man in a dream is evidence of the success that the dreamer will achieve. Then if one sees in a dream a good thing turning into a snake, this indicates the hostility that he shows to those around him. Changing the color of the body in a dream indicates a change in circumstances. Seeing the body turning into iron This indicates death. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s body: The body in a married woman’s dream indicates illness. Therefore, seeing the body in the form of a commodity is evidence of money, happiness, and joy. Seeing a sick corpse is evidence of the recovery of one of this woman’s family. If she sees in a dream that she is removing hair From her body, this indicates problems that will fall into her and marital disputes. Thick body hair in a married woman’s dream is evidence of misfortunes. Body hair may indicate the return of her husband from exile.

title: Interpretation of seeing a businessman in a dream

preview.html: When you see a merchant or a businessman in a dream, it indicates profit and gaining a rich and luxurious life, then reward through work. It also indicates moving from one place to another or a long trip. Whoever saw a businessman in the dream, this means that you act with reason and wisdom in important life matters. But if a married woman sees that her husband has become a businessman, this is evidence of moving to a new, better life, and getting a change in life in a positive way. Where she sees a businessman smiling and her beautiful features, this is evidence of the end of a difficult period and the loss of sadness and anxiety for the viewer. Likewise, the dream It indicates the abundance of goodness for a married woman, achieving her goals and desires, and living in stability with her partner. Interpretation of seeing a businessman in a dream for a single woman: The vision indicates that you will have good luck and happiness in a short time. The vision also suggests obtaining a job or a job that has a prestigious status and soothes her heart But if she sees herself in a dream, traveling with him, this is evidence of an engagement with a wealthy man and someone outside the country. The interpretation of a businessman marrying a divorced woman in a dream may indicate seeing in a dream a special one returning again to her husband. It could also indicate a relationship with another God-fearing man. In it and compensate her for the suffering she went through. Interpretation of marrying a well-known businessman for a single woman: The dream may indicate a positive change, which is the management of a righteous and pious person. The dream also indicates achieving the goals that she seeks to achieve, then facilitating all matters of her life and living happily and happily. Interpretation This dream is that she will be connected to this person in reality and will make her heart happy and live with him in happiness and prosperity. As for her vision? She will get married, but the face is confused and sad, which suggests a feeling of anxiety and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about becoming rich in a dream: The vision shows need and poverty in the life of the fortuneteller, then a noticeable deterioration in the situation Material. Interpretation of a dream of a businessman in a dream of a pregnant woman. The dream foretells that she will obtain food and goodness in reality and after that blessings will come in her life. But if a man sees someone wearing elegant, good-looking clothes, this is evidence of loss of worry and sadness for her, and that she will have good and abundant wealth. Interpretation of the vision The president in a dream by Ibn Sirin When you see in a dream a senior official like the president, this is evidence of changing life for the better, happiness of the heart with good news, and the acquisition of an abundance of sustenance. As for the dream of getting rid of this senior official or killing him, it indicates a promotion or obtaining a big job with a high position. Well, be. A careful official with a kind face. A smile is evidence of a high position in society and among people, and God knows best. Likewise, entering the house of a high-ranking official in a prostration position indicates here that he has committed great sins and that the dreamer is afraid of punishment. This is good if he is guilty, as this indicates the forgiveness of this employee. However, if the action was not done due to any sin, then the dream indicates that he will obtain a high position and a high position. Seeing a dream in which the employee divorced a partner in his life is evidence of this boss leaving his job or work. Seeing the official hitting people with a fist

title: Interpretation of seeing a lightning bolt in a dream and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream: There are many natural phenomena that can occur in the world and can be accompanied by many different manifestations that can, as a result, be signs of their occurrence. Examples of phenomena that occur include earthquakes, volcanoes, and floods, which can be accompanied by many signs. Other signs such as lightning, wind, and the interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream are disturbing things that make a person search for many explanations for that. Interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream: Many lightning bolts can occur and have different causes, and each phenomenon resulting from lightning has the reasons that led to its occurrence and the interpretation of seeing lightning. In a dream, it can have many signs, including: It may be from humans for the good and livelihood that God will enjoy. Ibn Sirin also interpreted her vision as the threat and punishment that awaits the dreamer. Also, seeing storms is a sign of sadness and misfortunes for the Lord in his coming life. Commentators also explained that lightning is one of the signs of surprises in the dreamer’s life. Seeing lightning in the dark indicates that the dreamer is entering a state of turmoil. While burning lightning can express the sadness that will happen to people. Also, seeing a large number of lightning bolts promises In a certain place is a sign of an enemy attack. Lightning found in a place known to the fortuneteller, indicates the punishment that will fall on the owners of this place. Death by lightning is one of the signs of great difficulty in the life of the fortuneteller. Fear of lightning and a sign of repentance and closeness to God. Seeing lightning without Hearing his voice is one of the signs of hearing shocking news about the priest. While you see the lightning of the silent patient, this is good news for his recovery. When lightning strikes one of your acquaintances and relatives, it portends a quarrel that will arise between you. While you see lightning in the house, it is evidence of the losses of that house. See also: Interpretation of seeing plums in a dream and its connotations in detail. I dreamed that I was struck by lightning in a married woman. An electric shock is considered a dangerous matter that can lead to the death of a person and the immediate loss of life. I dreamed that I was struck by lightning in a married woman, evidence of: - In the event that you see that lightning is winter, and its appearance leads To rain, this indicates the goodness that you will obtain. It is also a sign of good news that you will receive in the coming periods. Lightning when it strikes the merchant is evidence of his loss. Many scholars have interpreted the lightning strike according to the details of the dreamer’s dream. See also: Interpretation of a dream to see The tambourine in a dream is completely written by the most famous interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about lightning, thunder, and rain. When rain falls, it can be accompanied by many signs and manifestations, including lightning and thunder, as its presence in a dream is considered an annoying matter for the pioneer. Interpretation of a dream about slavery, thunder, and rainAmong the things that have many elements: Lightning is one of Signs of a fortune teller. Also, lightning can be seen in a dream as one of the human beings in the gulf. Aside from the thunder seen in a person’s dream, it can indicate changes that will happen.

title: Interpretation of goods in a dream

preview.html: For my interview, the interpretation of goods in a dream, through this article, God Almighty said: “They said: Great dreams, and we do not interpret dreams with two worlds (44).” Goods in a dream, follow us. Interpretation of goods in a dreamOne of the interpretations given about seeing goods in a dream is that it is one of the visions that symbolize the efforts, efforts and efforts that the dreamer makes to earn a living from an additional source. Among the interpretations of this vision is also that it expresses the dreamer’s desire and continuous efforts to change The house in which he lives in the current period. Interpretation of a dream about a shopping center in a dream: If one sees in a dream major commercial markets, or what are known as commercial centers, and the goods they contain. This vision is a good omen for the pioneer that abundant sustenance will come to him and that he will receive money. If someone sees in a dream warehouses without expired goods or old materials. It also expresses the abundant goodness that comes to the dreamer. In the event that you see an increase in the prices of goods, various goods in stores; This vision indicates that this dreamer will face many problems and crises in the coming period in terms of achieving his ambitions and dreams. As for the decline in commodity prices, it symbolizes a decline in the level of morality in society and the environment surrounding the person who sees it. If one sees in a dream that the prices of commodities and merchandise Medium, it is neither high nor low. It is a strong indication of the level and balance of his conditions in the current period, and it is one of the good visions. Seeing large, clean and tidy stores in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will achieve all his various dreams. And if the fortuneteller buys an expensive commodity. It is an indication that he will achieve all his dreams of marriage or work as soon as possible. If it turns out that he cannot buy, he will lose his money; This vision expresses the period in which the viewer is going through problems and crises. Seeing buying goods in a dream generally symbolizes the ability of that person to find different solutions to all his problems and difficulties and that he can also succeed in his life. Interpretation of opening a store in a dreamIf one sees in a dream that he is opening a store from which type. This vision portends the arrival of good news to him, and the happiness of the news depends on the cleanliness, size, and beauty of the solution. Seeing a store or store in a dream, whether small or large, and full of goods, indicates the psychological state that the dreamer is going through at the present time. In the case of seeing the goods inside the store But in an inappropriate situation. It refers to the random state that the dreamer experiences during the period of leisure. If these goods are in a state of order and organization; This vision indicates great positive energy within the visionary. If someone sees a closed store in a dream. This vision indicates the lack of opportunities for the visionary person, his suffering, and putting a lot of effort and energy into achieving his dreams and goals. It also indicates the need for him to remain patient and continue trying. Interpretation of a dream about a food store for a single woman: seeing a person in a dream going to grocery stores, selling food, and shopping. He is crossing

title: Interpretation of seeing a clothing market in a dream has different interpretations

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a clothing market in a dream for single and married women has different interpretations. The market sells different types of goods and items that people need, and there are many people of different ages walking around it. He will also receive the work that he will have to do after putting it together. In this article we will learn together about the interpretation of the vision of buying clothes in a dream for single women with different interpretations.Interpretation of the dream of seeing the clothing market in a dream for a single womanWe present below the interpretation of the vision of buying clothes in a dream for a single woman, where the girl hopes A single woman always wants to live a quiet life full of security and love, and enjoy it with a good man chosen by her fearful heart. God is in their souls, and makes them a queen of the women's group, as they wish to have a job. Suitable for years of study and scientific experience. Shopping in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates an abundance of goods. Buying in a dream symbolizes an imminent marriage in an unmarried girl’s dream. In an unmarried girl’s dream, buying indicates happiness, contentment, and abundance of goodness. Buying in a dream is interpreted for someone other than For married people, it is a source of great livelihood and abundant money that an unmarried woman will receive. As for going to the market, it means the release of anxiety and sadness, and the arrival of an abundance of goodness and overwhelming happiness. The market in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the world, and if it is well-filled, then this indicates goodness and happiness for her. Buying clothes in a dream symbolizes veiled single women and an auspicious marriage. Buying clothes in an unmarried girl’s dream interprets that she will have a good husband who will make her happy. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a walk in the market for single people in a dream: Seeing an unmarried girl walking in the markets means goodness and happiness. Seeing a walk in the market The markets in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolize goodness, happiness, and freedom from psychological pain. Seeing her walking in the markets symbolizes the unique girl who solves problems and gets rid of worries and pain. Her shopping and walking around in an unmarried girl’s clothes symbolizes getting rid of the single girl’s responsibilities and inexhaustible fears. Buying perfumes in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the fulfillment of desires, great happiness, and the acquisition of all good things. The vegetable market in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates blessings and abundant sustenance. Buying honey in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes liberation from illness and recovery from all evil. Entry Market in a dream for an unmarried girl means that she will obtain an excellent position at work and will receive promotions. Interpretation of a dream about buying clothes for a married woman: A married girl always hopes that God Almighty will grant her peace, tranquility, and happiness. She also hopes that there will be affection and mercy between her and her husband, especially since she is busy. She loves her children very much, and wishes them success and happiness. Safety and love. Buying clothes in a dream for a married woman is a welcome vision. Buying clothes in a married woman’s dream symbolizes abundance of goodness, coverage, and purity. A married woman entering the market indicates an abundance of good deeds. Buying clothes

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing a sheikh in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing an old man in a dream is one of the recurring visions for many people, as this vision carries many different interpretations and evidence, as dreaming of an old man in a dream indicates good things that are in the dreamer’s interest, and it can also indicate bad things such as extreme sadness in the life of the dreamer. Man and other interpretations are the complications that the dreamer can see in his dream and which we will learn about in detail in the following lines. Seeing an old man in a dream Seeing an old man in a dream means blessings, contentment, wealth, kindness, living, money and happiness in everything. Seeing an old woman in a dream is a sign of Goodness. Seeing an old woman in a dream also indicates contentment, sustenance, happiness, joy, and cheerfulness. As for seeing an old woman in a dream, with an undesirable appearance and an untidy appearance, this is a sign of conflict, the end of aggression, and liberation from poverty, deprivation, and disease. If one sees in a dream An old woman who has grown and weighs a lot, this is a sign of kindness, nourishment, and the removal of diseases and ills. Seeing an old man in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing an old man in a dream is a sign of the world and that the dreamer will enjoy a long life. Seeing an old man in a dream also indicates that the dreamer He will be exposed to lies and deception. Seeing an old woman in a dream while she is sick indicates the weakness and weakness of the dreamer. Seeing a thirsty old man in a dream symbolizes the drought that will hit the country. As for seeing an old woman wearing a hijab in a dream, this indicates the dreamer’s remorse and difficulties in all aspects. His life. This specialized online dream interpretation website features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type online dream interpretation site on Google. title: Interpretation of seeing Mohammed bin Salman in a dream and talking to him

preview.html: Seeing Mohammed bin Salman in a dream and talking to him. Mohammed bin Salman is the Crown Prince of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, the First Deputy Prime Minister, and is considered the youngest Minister of Defense in the world. There is no doubt that seeing the Crown Prince in general in a dream is one of the dreams that brings pleasure to the hearts. Many people are wondering about the meanings and connections and this we will explain in detail in the following lines of the article. Seeing Muhammad bin Salman in a dream and talking to him. Learn about the interpretations of jurists by seeing Muhammad bin Salman in a dream and talking to him: Seeing Muhammad bin Salman and talking to him in a dream is individual. It symbolizes many good things that will come to a person in the coming period and a feeling of happiness, contentment and peace of mind. If a young man dreams that he is talking with Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, this is a sign of his ability to achieve his desires and goals and that he will witness many good transformations in the coming period. If he sees When a man dreams that he is talking to Mohammed bin Salman, this is a sign of the stability and contentment that he enjoys in his life, as well as the fact that he will soon obtain a lot of money. In general, seeing Mohammed bin Salman in a dream leads to the achievement of goals and blessings that will permeate the dreamer’s life in the future. The coming days. Seeing Muhammad bin Salman in a dream and talking to him with Ibn Shirin. There are many interpretations explained by the great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin - may God have mercy on him - when he dreamed of Muhammad bin Salman and talking to him. The most important of them can be clarified through the following: Seeing Muhammad bin Salman in a dream symbolizes the ability The dreamer indicates that he will reach a distinguished position in the society in which he lives and obtain promotions in the course of his work. If one dreams that he shakes hands with Mohammed bin Salman while talking to him, this proves that he will soon travel abroad to study or work and earn money. If one suffers from debt He saw Mohammed bin Salman talking to him and smiling at him in the dream, then this is a sign that God - the Almighty - will help him pay it off and give him a lot of money. When you dream that Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman visits you at home and talks to you, this is a sign of recovery and recovery soon. God willing. Seeing Mohammed bin Salman in a dream and talking to him about single people. If a girl dreams of marrying Mohammed bin Salman and talking to him, this proves that the date of her engagement and marriage is approaching, in reality, with a prominent man who belongs to a prominent family. If the unmarried woman is a science student and dreams that She is talking with Mohammed bin Salman and he is smiling, this is a sign of her superiority over her peers and that she has obtained the highest academic degrees. If the girl is looking for a job in reality and she sees in a dream Mohammed bin Salman and he was talking to her, this is a sign that God Almighty will grant her success in whatever she wants and she will receive a reward. . A salary from work improves her living conditions. If an unmarried woman suffers from anxiety and distress in her life and dreams of the heir to the throne, Mohammed bin Salman, this symbolizes the removal of anxiety and the death of the worries and anxieties that were in her chest. Seeing Mohammed bin Salman in a dream and talking to him

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for clothes from a living person according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for clothes from a living person is interesting to many people because it seems to be one of the strange dreams that requires questioning. Scientists have worked hard to find almost certain explanations for all cases of the dream, where one might see that he is giving clothes to the deceased to wear, and another might see that the dead person is asking for Washing it. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person who asked for clothes from a living person: Seeing dead people asking for clothes from a living person can be evidence that something bad has happened to the pioneer, especially if the dead person puts it on and then takes it off, and here the dreamer must pray a lot to God Almighty for comfort and comfort. As for the dead person who asks for clothes In a dream, he wears them without taking them off. The dream is evidence that good faith comes to the dreamer in any of his life’s considerations, whether practical or personal. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for clothes from a living person, and these clothes are somewhat old, so this may symbolize that the dreamer will be exposed to some financial problems soon. And God knows best. The interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for clothes from a living person by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking clothes from a living person according to Ibn Shirin has many connotations and meanings, by the command of God Almighty. Ibn Sirin also believes that a deceased person asking a living person in a dream for his clothes is evidence that the dreamer will soon settle in His life, where God can open a new door for him to live, enables him to live a happy and peaceful life. As for a dead person’s dream of asking a neighborhood about old clothes, this may indicate that the dreamer is exposed to financial problems that cause him to live a difficult and worrying period in his life. A person may dream of delivering clothes after they have been washed and cleaned, and here the dream of requesting clothes from a neighborhood indicates an heir, and the dreamer may get a lot of money. Money as an inheritance from this deceased. And God knows best. The interpretation of a dream about a deceased person requesting clothes from a living person for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about a deceased person requesting clothes from a living person for a single woman carries a number of meanings according to the nature of the vision, and it is a great thing for the dreamer’s bad relationship with her Lord, which requires her to review herself and stop the sin. Come closer to God Almighty and repent. To him. The fortuneteller may take clothes from the dead person in a dream instead of giving them to him, and when the dead person insists on the girl taking the clothes, this indicates the need for that girl to return the rest of her clothes and then return them to her. Their owners as soon as possible.Interpretation of a dream of a dead person who asks for clothes from a living person for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person who asks for clothes from a living person and receives and gives him beautiful clothes for a married woman indicates that she is a fundamentally good woman, and God Almighty will grant her a lot of goodness and blessings in her life. He will live a more comfortable and stable life than before. Also, the dream of the deceased asking for clothes from the neighborhood may indicate that the fortuneteller has a good reputation among the people, and that she wants to do many good deeds, and that she is committed to the teachings of her religion, and of course she must continue this. The way no matter what evils and temptations he faces in this world. A married woman may dream of the opposite, and she sees that she is the one taking clothes from the dead in a dream, and this is interpreted as some kind of negligence in her religion,

title: Interpretation of a dream about prison according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a prison or prison in a dream for single, married, pregnant and divorced women, escaping from prison, getting out of it, entering prison unjustly, imprisoning a person, leaving prison, crying over the true imam of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of prison in a dream appears what pigeons appear, and perhaps it shows the disease that prevents it from Acting and doing, perhaps explaining the reason for the journey, perhaps showing the grave, and perhaps hell, because it is a prison for people. He is a sinner and a traitor, and because prison is the place of punishment and the place of criminals and injustice, so whoever sees himself in prison, review his condition and the condition of the prison. If he is sick and the prison is unknown, then this is his grave and he will remain in it until the Resurrection. If he knows the prison, his illness will be prolonged, and I hope that he will wake up and rise in this world, which is a prison for its companions, because the point of reference is the prison of the believer and the unbeliever. Paradise. If the sick person is a criminal, then the prison whose grave is unknown and known indicates his long stay in his illness and his life is not expected unless he repents or converts to Islam during his illness. If he is a Muslim, then he is imprisoned from Paradise for the sins and consequences that remain with him. As for the healthy living person, if he sees himself in prison, see What he is in, if he travels by land or ship, is that he is mentally damaged and hindered by rain, wind, enemy, war, or the command of the Sultan, and if he is not a traveler, he enters a place where he disobeys God, such as the church, or the house of thought and heresy, or the house of the adulterer, or the veil of each person according to his ability. And what's in it. The pause of what came down when the question was asked, or his knowledge of fame or the increase in his sleep from his words and actions in his dreams, and it was said: he saw that he had chosen for himself. The woman tempts him out of himself, and God takes away her advice from him and informs him of his intention, according to the Almighty’s saying: “The Lord of the prison is dearer to me than what I call upon Him.” On the authority of Sabir bin Ardashir, he saw him in his father’s life building prisons and taking pigs and monkeys from the Romans and placing them in them. He took over the Roman king after the death of his father and built the city of Nishapur, the city of Ahwas, and the city of Soran. Interpretation of the prison in a dream for Nabulsi: A dream about Nabulsi’s prison: In a dream, it is an indication of the necessity of religion if it is a legitimate prison. If the Sultan’s prison expresses anxiety and sadness due to slander or hypocrisy, and the unknown prison is the world, Imprisonment is slander against one's wife, or silence, and imprisonment of the tongue for slander. Perhaps it indicates the machinations of enemies, accusations, danger and debts, refraining from traveling due to illness or lack of activity, and shows poverty and lack of comfort. Entering prison indicates long life and meeting loved ones. Prison is sadness and grief. Whoever chooses a prison for himself is free of sin. Whoever sees that he has been released from prison will be saved from illness. Whoever sees that the prison doors are open will be saved from his imprisonment, and the same applies if he sees a window and light in it, or sees that his roof has been torn off, and imprisonment is a well. It is the death of the traveler and the sick. Whoever sees that he is in the prison of a trusted sultan, then something bad will happen to him or he will be distressed, hoping for recovery. Whoever sees that it has come out of him will come out of that mouth. If he is a traveler and the prison has neglected him, and if he is sick, then it is the duration of his illness. It was said: Whoever sees that he is in prison, then this is an answered prayer. A way out of worry and distress is due to the story of Yusuf, peace be upon him. May peace and blessings be upon him

In the event that a pregnant woman sees a cat that resembles The tiger may indicate the imminence of childbirth, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a cat flying in a dream. If the dreamer sees a cat flying in a dream, then it can express kindness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow cat chasing me in a dream. When a single girl sees a yellow cat chasing her, this may indicate that she gets money in different ways. Bad, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married man sees a cat, it may express kindness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a cat hugging him, this may be a sign of good news, and God knows the unseen. Red, he can return to his wisdom, and God knows the unseen, while seeing a red cat can indicate betrayal, and God knows best, and it may also indicate the danger that surrounds him, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a white cat loving me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a white cat loving me in a dream. Seeing a white cat can indicate good news. And God knows the unseen. It can also refer to independence, and God knows best. In the event that the dreamer sees a white cat, this could lead to rebellion and independence, and God knows the unseen.
